    • Constructor Detail

      • GroundingRoutine

        public GroundingRoutine(java.io.File placeHolderDir,
                        java.io.File sourceInputDir,
                        java.io.File sourceOutputDir,
                        java.io.File configFile)
        Class for the grounding routine. The grounding routine is responsible for substituting code templates with given values. Furthermore, it compiles the code template and trains the resulting classifier.
        Parameters:
        placeHolderDir - The directory the files for the placeholders of the code template are located.
        sourceInputDir - The directory the plain code template is located.
        sourceOutputDir - The directory, the grounded code template shall be copied to and where the source code is compiled to binaries and executed.
        configFile - The file containing the configuration values for the grounding routine.

    • Method Detail

      • codeAssembly

        public void codeAssembly()

      • compile

        public void compile()

      • trainModel

        public void trainModel(java.io.File trainingData)

      • buildInstances

        public void buildInstances(java.io.File dataFile,
                           int numberOfInstancesToBuild)
        Use the compiled prototype to build numberOfInstancesToBuild many instances from the given dataFile.
        Parameters:
        dataFile - The zip file containing the data that shall be transformed into instances.
        numberOfInstancesToBuild - Number of instances that are desired to be built from the given data file. A negative value or a value of zero indicates to transform all data from the dataFile into instances.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
